metadata.Title: CVE-2010-1195 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the htmlscrubber component in ikiwiki 2.x before 2.53.5 and 3.x before 3.20100312 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted data:image/svg+xml URI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-1195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20130904.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20130904.1ubuntu1').
